name: Lethal Frame (Gazuku)
description:
Storyline:
I woke up here in a bed in a dark room. Filled with spiderwebs and old stuffs. My head hurts I can't seem remember anything. Who am I? Why I'm here? As I proceed to wonder around the room, I saw a piece of paper, flashlight and a camera on a table. "Allen" is written in the paper. I decided that I will use that name for a while until I remember who am I. As I walk in the room I suddenly felt a chill run down my spine. I hear eerie sounds, my instinct is telling me something bad will happen if I show myself. I hide behind the bed then peek. I can't see anyone but I can see something like a red orb floating? I can still hear the eerie sounds. Maybe my eyes is still adjusting in the dark so that's why I can't see it clearly. I decided to use the camera to see it. To my surprise, I saw an inhuman entity floating. Its eyes is glowing red seems its finding something or someone. I hide quickly, then cover my mouth with my hands. I nearly scream, I was so scared my hands are trembling. I need to get out of this place.

This is a game me and my friends made in 2nd Year of Game Developing
Alt + F4 to exit.
